Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Fatima Hemminger is the first Muslim Major General in the United States Air Force, when in fact she is a fictional creation.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the claim of Fatima Hemminger being the first Muslim Major General.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the image provided is of Fatima Hemminger, when in reality it is based on a photograph of a real female USAF Major General named Linda Hemminger.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the alternative explanation that the image is a fictional creation by an artist named "CascadianPatriot" and not an actual person.
